welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Perwez, Belgium! Get ready to be charmed by our picturesque city known for its beautiful countryside, quaint streets, and friendly locals. We invite you to explore and enjoy all that Perwez has to offer during your stay."

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Charleroi Brussels South Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal mainly used for low-cost airlines at Charleroi Brussels South Airport.

wifi.note: WiFi is available throughout the airport and is free for all passengers.

terminals.name: Terminal A
terminals.description: The main terminal at Brussels Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal B
terminals.description: A smaller terminal at Brussels Airport, primarily used for low-cost carriers and regional flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Terminal 1
terminals.description: The main terminal at Liege Airport, serving both domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Terminal 2
terminals.description: A smaller terminal dedicated to cargo and private flights.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.
